Package controller

Class ModifyProductForm

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyProductForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductForm extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Holds all the methods of the Modify Product Form controller.

  • Constructor Details

    • ModifyProductForm

      public ModifyProductForm()

  • Method Details

    • transferProduct

      public void transferProduct(int index)
      Transfers the index of the selected product from the main form and populates text fields with data. Transfers the index of the selected product from the main form and uses the index to get the corresponding product. The product's getter methods are used to fill the text boxes and table that holds the associated parts is filled with the parts that are associated with the product.
      Parameters:
      index - of the selected product from the main form

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      When the scene is loaded part data is added to the part table and the product's associated parts table is created. Upon loading the scene the table listing all the available parts is fill with all part information and the product's associated parts table is created.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • onActionAddPartToModifiedProduct

      void onActionAddPartToModifiedProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Adds a selected part to the product. Adds a selected part to the associated parts list that belongs to the product.
      Parameters:
      event - the add button under the part table is pressed

    • onActionCancelModifiedProduct

      void onActionCancelModifiedProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Cancels product modification and returns to main form. Cancels part modification, any changes made to the product are lost, and returns to the main form.
      Parameters:
      event - the cancel button is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionRemovePartFromModifiedProduct

      void onActionRemovePartFromModifiedProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes a part from the associated parts list. Asks for confirmation before removing a part from the product's associated parts list and also tells the user if no part has been selected when the button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - the remove button is pressed

    • onActionSaveModifiedProduct

      void onActionSaveModifiedProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Saves the altered product with modified data to the list of all products. Creates a new product using using data from text fields and the associated products list to replace the old product that was being modified. Catches exceptions for parsing integer and double variable and checks if min is greater than max and if inv is between min and max.
      Parameters:
      event - the save button is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionModifyProductSearch

      void onActionModifyProductSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Searches the parts list for the input in the search field. Searches the parts list and returns either a part with a unique id or parts with names that contain the searched for string. A window pops up to inform the user if no results are found.
      Parameters:
      event - the enter button is pressed when the cursor is in the search box
